content.webTitle: Sophie Forte: Six of the best Body scrubs

fields.headline: Six of the best
fields.bodyText: £8 This fresh-feeling scrub leaves skin squeaky clean and smooth, thanks to a double whammy of exfoliating beads and alpha hydroxy acids that help dissolve dead skin cells. Great for giving thighs a good scrub down. · L'Oreal Paris Exfotonic, from Boots and Superdrug £12 This natural, fabulously scented scrub delivers on its energising promise. Packed with skin-friendly aromatherapy oils and exfoliating grains: great in the mornings. · Liz Earle Energising Body Scrub, lizearle.com, 01983 813913 £13 Sprinkle these ground olive pits into your shower gel (or body oil) to concoct your personalised scrub. Seriously effective. · Aromatherapy Associates Natural Exfoliating Grains, aromatherapyassociates.com, 020-8569 7030 £20 A gentle shower gel that contains delicate buffing beads and smells deliciously spa-like. Will keep limbs smooth - and prevent dreaded build-up of patchy fake tan. · E'Spa Smoothing Shower Gel, espaonline.com 01252 352230 £20 A super-spreadable salt scrub: it won't leak when you travel and it won't slide off your limbs on to the shower floor. Leaves skin smooth. · Origins Incredible Spreadable Scrub, 0800 731 4039 £31 A foaming exfoliating cream covers legs in Mister Whippy-style foam so that the silver scrubbing mitt that comes with it can really get to work. The next best thing to a full body microdermabrasion. · Dior Plasticity Body Beautifying Micro Peel, 020-7216 0216
